verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered צֹפַ֥ר <S%H6691><s%> Zophar הַֽנַּעֲמָתִ֗י <S%H5284><s%> the Naamathite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

הֲרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> Should not the multitude דְּ֭בָרִים <S%H1697><s%> of words לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵעָנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> be answered וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ? and should a man שְׂפָתַ֣יִם <S%H8193><s%> full of talk יִצְדָּֽק׃ <S%H6663><s%> be justified

בַּ֭דֶּיךָ <S%H907><s%> Should thy lies מְתִ֣ים <S%H4962><s%> men יַחֲרִ֑ישׁו <S%H2790><s%> hold their peace וַ֝תִּלְעַ֗ג <S%H3932><s%> ? and when thou mockest וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and none מַכְלִֽם׃ <S%H3637><s%> shall no man make thee ashamed

וַ֭תֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> For thou hast said זַ֣ךְ <S%H2134><s%> [is] pure לִקְחִ֑י <S%H3948><s%> My doctrine וּ֝בַ֗ר <S%H1249><s%> and I am clean הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> am בְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> But מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> oh יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> oh that אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> God דַּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> would speak וְיִפְתַּ֖ח <S%H6605><s%> and open שְׂפָתָ֣יו <S%H8193><s%> his lips עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> against

וְיַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> And that he would shew לְךָ֨ ׀ תַּֽעֲלֻמ֣וֹת <S%H8587><s%> thee the secrets חָכְמָה֮ <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כִפְלַ֪יִם <S%H3718><s%> that [they are] double לְֽת֫וּשִׁיָּ֥ה <S%H8454><s%> to that which is וְדַ֡ע <S%H3045><s%> Know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H5382><s%> exacteth לְךָ֥ אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַ <S%H433><s%> therefore that God מֵעֲוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5771><s%> of thee [less] than thine iniquity

הַחֵ֣קֶר <S%H2714><s%> Canst thou by searching אֱל֣וֹהַ <S%H433><s%> God תִּמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> find out אִ֤ם <S%H518><s%> lo עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against תַּכְלִ֖ית <S%H8503><s%> the limits שַׁדַּ֣י <S%H7706><s%> out the Almighty תִּמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> discover

גָּבְהֵ֣י <S%H1363><s%> [It is] as high שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> as heaven מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תִּפְעָ֑ל <S%H6466><s%> what canst thou do עֲמֻקָּ֥ה <S%H6013><s%> ? deeper מִ֝שְּׁא֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> than hell מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תֵּדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> what canst thou know

אֲרֻכָּ֣ה <S%H752><s%> thereof [is] longer מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> than the earth מִדָּ֑הּ <S%H4055><s%> The measure וּ֝רְחָבָ֗ה <S%H7342><s%> and broader מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> than יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> than the sea

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יַחֲלֹ֥ף <S%H2498><s%> If he cut off וְיַסְגִּ֑יר <S%H5462><s%> and shut up וְ֝יַקְהִ֗יל <S%H6950><s%> or gather together וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יְשִׁיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> then who can hinder

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> For he knoweth מְתֵי־ <S%H4962><s%> men שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> vain וַיַּרְא־ <S%H7200><s%> he seeth אָ֝֗וֶן <S%H205><s%> wickedness וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without יִתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H995><s%> also will he not then consider

וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man נָ֭בוּב <S%H5014><s%> For vain יִלָּבֵ֑ב <S%H3823><s%> would be wise וְעַ֥יִר <S%H5895><s%> colt פֶּ֝֗רֶא <S%H6501><s%> [like] a wild ass's אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> though man יִוָּלֵֽד׃ <S%H3205><s%> be born

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אַ֭תָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you הֲכִינ֣וֹתָ <S%H3559><s%> If thou prepare לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart וּפָרַשְׂתָּ֖ <S%H6566><s%> and stretch אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> out כַּפֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3709><s%> out thine hands

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אָ֣וֶן <S%H205><s%> If iniquity בְּ֭יָדְךָ <S%H3027><s%> [be] in thine hand הַרְחִיקֵ֑הוּ <S%H7368><s%> put it far away וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּשְׁכֵּ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> dwell בְּאֹהָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H168><s%> in thy tabernacles עַוְלָֽה׃ <S%H5766><s%> and let not wickedness

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed אָ֤ז ׀ <S%H227><s%> Then תִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> For then shalt thou lift up פָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face מִמּ֑וּם <S%H3971><s%> without spot וְהָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become מֻ֝צָ֗ק <S%H3332><s%> yea thou shalt be stedfast וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not תִירָֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> and shalt not fear

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> you עָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> [thy] misery תִּשְׁכָּ֑ח <S%H7911><s%> Because thou shalt forget כְּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [it] as waters עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> [that] pass away תִזְכֹּֽר׃ <S%H2142><s%> [and] remember

וּֽ֭מִצָּהֳרַיִם <S%H6672><s%> than the noonday יָק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall be clearer חָ֑לֶד <S%H2465><s%> And [thine] age תָּ֝עֻ֗פָה <S%H5774><s%> thou shalt shine forth כַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> thou shalt be as the morning תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וּֽ֭בָטַחְתָּ <S%H982><s%> And thou shalt be secure כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> because there is תִּקְוָ֑ה <S%H8615><s%> hope וְ֝חָפַרְתָּ֗ <S%H2658><s%> yea thou shalt dig לָבֶ֥טַח <S%H983><s%> in safety תִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> [about thee and] thou shalt take thy rest

וְֽ֭רָבַצְתָּ <S%H7257><s%> Also thou shalt lie down וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and none מַחֲרִ֑יד <S%H2729><s%> and none shall make [thee] afraid וְחִלּ֖וּ <S%H2470><s%> shall make suit פָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> unto thee רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> yea many

וְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> But the eyes רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תִּ֫כְלֶ֥ינָה <S%H3615><s%> shall fail וּ֭מָנוֹס <S%H4498><s%> escape אָבַ֣ד <S%H6><s%> will be no מִנְהֶ֑ם <S%H4480><s%> them וְ֝תִקְוָתָ֗ם <S%H8615><s%> and their hope מַֽפַּח־ <S%H4646><s%> [shall be as] the giving up נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> of the ghost פ
